briefTitle: Effects of Lutein Supplementation on Subclinical Atherosclerosis

armGroups.label: Normal lutein control group
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Normal lutein control group

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* early atherosclerosis;
* aged 45 to 68 years;
* Han nationality

Exclusion Criteria:

* history of myocardial infarction,
* stroke,
* revascularization,
* coronary by-pass operation,
* local carotid IMT \> 1300μm or supplemental vitamin and/or mineral use for ≥ 4 week before the start of the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Table 1 Study Specific Characteristic Part One
outcomeMeasures.description: The percentage of female, race, hypertenion history, diabetes history, and hyperlipemia history was calculated.

outcomeMeasures.title: Table 1 Study Specific Characteristic of Age
outcomeMeasures.description: the mean and standard deviation of age was calculated in four groups

outcomeMeasures.title: Table 1 Study Specific Characteristic of Body Mass Index (BMI)
outcomeMeasures.description: the mean and standard deviation of BMI in four groups was calculated

outcomeMeasures.title: Table 1 Study Specific Characteristic of Blood Pressure (BP)
outcomeMeasures.description: systolic BP and diastolic BP in four groups was measure twice between 15minutes

outcomeMeasures.title: Table 1 Study Specific Characteristic of Serum Carotenoids
outcomeMeasures.description: serum major carotenoids, including lutein, zeaxanthin, beta-carotene, and lycopene concentration were measured by hyper-pressure liquid chromatography (HPLC)

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes of Right Common Carotid Arterial Stiffness Parameter β(R-β) at Baseline and After 12 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: Arterial stiffness was measured by using a high-resolution B-mode carotid ultrasound with echo-tracking system (Aloka prosound α-10, Aloka Co. Ltd., Tokyo, Japan).

outcomeMeasures.title: Dietary Intake of Energy During the Study Periods
outcomeMeasures.description: Dietary intake was assessed at baseline and after 12months by using 3 consecutive 24-hour recalls.

outcomeMeasures.title: Dietary Intake of Vitamin C,Vitamin E, Lutein Plus Zeaxanthin and Lycopene During the Study Periods
outcomeMeasures.description: Dietary intake of Vitamin C,Vitamin E, Lutein plus zeaxanthin and Lycopene was assessed at baseline and after 12months by using 3 consecutive 24-hour recalls.
